Articles.Content: The other day I saw a screen on the addons forum of the squad relic on the Mun, is it real or part of an addon?
Its real!I belive there are three or two of them, I dont know, I forgott after I found them There called Munoliths
Do they all look the same? Tonight i was orbiting the Mun and saw something that look like an archway on the surface.

There are actually quite a lot. Not just on the Mun, but also on Minmus and Kerbin. It\'s a lot of fun to search for them.

EDIT: ninja\'d, there are currently 2 different types of easter eggs: monoliths and arches. It seems like you spotted one already; go land next to it and take pictures!
The arches are so fun to land next to ...even more fun to accidentally fly through one while doing a gravity slingshot to Minmus..I deserve a trophy for being the first person to do so ._.

The arches are so fun to land next to ...even more fun to accidentally fly through one while doing a gravity slingshot to Minmus..I deserve a trophy for being the first person to do so ._.

you.. did?

PCITURE?

Actually, I dont have one at the moment sadly, I did not see it coming at all ._. it was like...Bam!There goes the arch..and some hill barley clipped my rockets extra attached fuel tank for mid course corrections right before, so I was worried about that :L sorry.Ill try to do it again tonight
